titleStmt.title: An exposition of the whole book of the Revelation wherein the visions and prophecies of Christ are opened and expounded : shewing the great conquests of our lord Jesus Christ for his church over all his and her adversaries pagan, arian, and papal ... / by H.K.
titleStmt.author: Knollys, Hanserd, 1599?-1691.
